name: Journey Jake: Match 3 and Grow
description:
Discover and interact with a charming fully 3-D world and travel to places unknown. Select the right dialogue choices and either kindle romance between Jake and his editor Sarah or make them fiercely competitive.

FEATURES:
* Play a unique and insanely fun puzzle game
* Match, stack, grow, build and collect
* Explore a lovely 3-D world
* Unlock new exciting story
* Choose your own dialogue options
* Influence the story and the outcome
* Fall in love with the characters

PLEASE NOTE! Journey Jake is free to play, however, some additional items can be purchased for real money or through special offers. If you don’t wish to use this feature, please adjust your device’s settings. By installing this game you agree to Terms of Service published here: https://www.trickytribe.com/terms-of-use/
